scripts.deploy:local: npm prepare:deploy scroll && npm codegen && graph deploy metrom-croc-scroll --node http://localhost:8020 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 -l 0.0.1
scripts.deploy:scroll:ambient: npm prepare:deploy scroll ambient && npm codegen && graph deploy metrom-ambient-scroll -l 0.0.8
scripts.deploy:swell:ambient: npm prepare:deploy swellchain ambient && npm codegen && graph deploy metrom-ambient-swell -l 0.0.6
